name: Claydol ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Type Shift
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Claydol ex’s type is {F} until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Crush
attacks.effect: You may discard a {P} Energy card attached to Claydol ex. If you do, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
